channel.title: [PI] uploading client pls help
channel.description: I have a question: Do I just upload the complete client with everything in it or just a certain file? please help. I'm running on torvapkz source and as well as erasedpkz cache. Thanks

item.title: [PI] uploading client pls help
item.dc:creator: @baddy351 baddy351
item.description:
@baddy351 wrote:

Nah i wont do it, to set stuff as hidden, follow this tutorial ill write xD.

How to set files as hidden.

Step 1: The file that you like hidden, right click it.
Step 2: At the bottom you will see “properties” click it.
Step 3: You will see at the bottem two boxes to check, they read “read-only” and “hidden”.
Step 4: Check the “hidden” box and click “Apply” At the bottom right, then exit out.
ALL DONE. Wasn’t that hard was it? (you can do the same with the folders, but don’t combine all the files in one folder or else you will get errors all over the place)

Read full topic

item.title: [PI] uploading client pls help
item.dc:creator: @baddy351 baddy351
item.description:
@baddy351 wrote:

If you mean for a download then i suggest setting all the files but the run.bat to hidden, then zip the file, and upload to mediafire or w/e. (the hidden files means its cleaner and people don’t have to look for the run.bat)

Read full topic
